results.title: Accent on adventure
results.brief_description: Outdoor sports for boy scouts have been and continue to be a basic part of scouting. They require both nerve and skill. This is a report on some of them; including boating, potholing, rock climbing, hill walking, riding, skiing and motor cycling. A film depicting British scouting activities at their best.

results.title: Accelerating the seventies
results.creator_credit: Fred A Niles Communications Centre and Sterling Educational Films
results.brief_description: A visual description of the progress and potential problems of the rapid advancements of the 1970’s. Using rapid-fire cutting techniques the sense of pace of unchecked growth and its potential is transmitted to the viewer.

results.title: Abstraction
results.creator_credit: ACI Films, American Federation of Arts and Films Incorporated
results.brief_description: Shows that abstraction is an essential aspect of daily living. Uses a variety of examples to establish a definition of abstraction and to illustrate how the artist employs it when selecting what is visually and emotionally significant in the creation of their work.

results.title: Above the horizon
results.creator_credit: Hugh O'Connor, Roman Kroitor, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: An exciting exploration of the weather and how man may one day learn to control it. For this film a great deal of extraordinary colour footage of the sky was put together, including a demonstration of rain-making. There are views of the geysers of the sun, of bright streamers of northern lights, of wind-stirred clouds, and even the awesome fury of a hurricane. Photography: Jean Roy Awards: Sydney, Buenos Aires, Padua, Canadian

results.title: About time
results.creator_credit: Ed De Martin, Robert Marona and De Martin - Marona
results.brief_description: Presents the story of a girl and a tree she discovered as a child. Compares this relationship and the paradox of modern man caught in the time squeeze in order to point out the need for man to reorder his values concerning planet Earth.

results.title: Dummy
results.brief_description: Pregnant with absence, ‘Dummy’ depicts desolate urban and suburban environments. Filmed in and around Melbourne, these everyday, expectant spaces are captured with formal elegance and an accidental beauty that reveals a unique insight into the secret and forgotten life of Melbourne.
